Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-8096 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-8096 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-18, affected by CVE-2024-8096
